page.title: 01Thorpe Salvin-Overview
page.content: This area consists mainly of{farms}and {fields}bounded by mixed hedgerows where wild flowers like{buttercups, {campion, wild rose, blackberries, {nettles, clover}and{vetch}are growing. The{farm crops}are{wheat, barley, {oilseedrape, brussel sprouts, potatoes and{turnips.}Some livestock is kept also and at Bottom Farm there are 1100 {sheep and lambs,}while at Moor Mill Farm it is mainly{cattle}where they keep 60 to 100 beasts at a time, the main breed being{Friesians.}They are kept inside through the winter and fed on barley and hay before being sold at {Mansfield market.}Other industries include,{coal mining}at{Shireoaks, {quarrying}at the Steetley works and {forestry}in{Whitwell Wood.}The two villages of Shireoaks and Thorpe Salvin form the main residential areas.
